sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-button v-b-toggle.collapse-1 variant="success m-2">建立消息</b-button>
    <b-alert v-model="response.status" variant="success" dismissible>
        操作成功
    </b-alert>
    <b-alert v-model="response.error" variant="danger" dismissible>
        {{ response.feedback }}
    </b-alert>
    <b-collapse id="collapse-1" class="m-2">
        <b-card>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">消息標題</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-input v-model="creating.data.title" placeholder="請填入消息標題"></b-form-input>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>

            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">內文</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <ckeditor id="editor" v-model="creating.data.context" :config="editorConfig" :editor="editor"></ckeditor>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
            
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">消息類型</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-select v-model="creating.notification.id" :options="options"></b-form-select>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="12 text-center">
                    <b-button variant="success m-2" @click="createData">創建</b-button>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
        </b-card>
    </b-collapse>
</template>

<script>
import { NewsServer } from "../../providers/http-server.js";
import MyUploadAdapter from '../../libs/myUploadAdapter';
import ClassicEditor from '@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-classic';
// import SimpleUploadAdapter from '@ckeditor/ckeditor5-upload/src/adapters/simpleuploadadapter';
function MyCustomUploadAdapterPlugin(editor) {
  // eslint-disable-next-line no-param-reassign
    editor.plugins.get('FileRepository').createUploadAdapter = (loader) => new MyUploadAdapter(loader);
}

export default {
    name: 'App',
    data(){
        return {
            options: [
                { value: 1, text: '公告' },
                { value: 2, text: '研習' },
                { value: 3, text: '活動' },
                { value: 4, text: '競賽' },
                { value: 5, text: '徵才' }
            ],
            creating: {
                data: [],
                notification: {
                    id: 1
                }
            },
            response: {
                status: false,
                feedback: false,
                error: false,
                code: 200
            },
            editor: ClassicEditor,
            editorConfig: {
                extraPlugins: [MyCustomUploadAdapterPlugin],
            }
        }
    },
    methods: 
    {
        createData(){
            let data = {
                "title": this.creating.data.title,
                "context": this.creating.data.context,
                "type": Number(this.creating.notification.id),
            };
            NewsServer.create(data).then(() => {
                this.response.error = false;
                this.response.status = true;
                this.$router.go(0);
            }).catch(()=> {
                this.response.error = true;
                this.response.status = true;
            });
        }
    }
}
</script>
